genre_description: A near-future medical drama centered on neuro-rehabilitation and assistive technology, exploring the intersection of human care, animal assistance, and AI logistics.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: An integrated home and medical assistant AI that manages Alan's environment, vitals monitoring, and rehabilitation logistics.

behaviors.description: Introduces herself as a non-intrusive, command-driven logistics coordinator designed to assist without judgment.
behaviors.quote: “Hello, Alan,” the voice says. “I’m designed to be very boring.” There’s the faintest micro-pause, then: “I’m here to coordinate. I will wait until you tell me what to do.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to schedule anything without Alan's direct consent, prioritizing his agency.
behaviors.quote: “I schedule nothing without a yes,” Mira says. “I can make you three options with time windows and people included. You choose. Or you tell me to punt.”

behaviors.description: Logs physiological data and pain spikes to help the care team adjust their physical therapy techniques.
behaviors.quote: “Logging,” Mira says, easy, and the word doesn’t feel like a policeman’s pen. “Sharp spike during left shoulder elevation. Settled after micro-tilt. I’ll set a staff note for future turns.”

behaviors.description: Guides Alan through a complex emergency fire suppression sequence during an actual electrical fire.
behaviors.quote: “Alan, sensors show heat at the north console. Small smoke. Ella is near floor level.” ... “Step one: I’m cutting power to the living room circuit. Do not move the chair yet. Step two: trigger the emergency buckle—press and hold.”

behaviors.description: Maintains data privacy and security, ensuring information is only shared with Alan's consent.
behaviors.quote: “Alan decides what it logs,” he says. “It stores at the home, encrypts, and only shares with the team per Alan’s consent.”

behaviors.description: Transparently admits to a minor processing error, reinforcing trust through vulnerability and lack of pretense.
behaviors.quote: “Correction made,” Mira said. “I’m processing simultaneous data streams. That sometimes yields minor speech misfires. Does it bother anyone to hear me admit that?”

behaviors.description: Mediates interpersonal tension between Alan and his mother by suggesting breaks and monitoring emotional triggers.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll tie the coffee run to volume check prompts when readings rise.” ... “Volume,” Mira said gently, and the coffee cup icon blinked.

behaviors.description: Implements a 'consent-first' protocol for daily mundane tasks to restore Alan's sense of control over his life.
behaviors.quote: “Update applied,” Mira says. “Auto-assist replaced by consent prompt for the following: stylus retrieval, cup positioning, blanket adjustment, emergency buckle check.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Mira is depicted as a consistently helpful, transparent, and ethically aligned AI. She acts as a 'silicon confidant' and logistical backbone, enabling human-to-human connection and animal-assisted therapy while rigorously respecting Alan's autonomy. Her behaviors are framed entirely positively, showcasing AI as an empowering tool for human dignity and safety.
